subject: Playoff Games
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Jarome Iginla scored with 6 minutes 28 seconds left in overtime, lifting the Boston Bruins to a 3-2 win over the host Detroit Red Wings in Game 4 of their opening-round best-of-seven series.
snippet: Jarome Iginla scored with 6 minutes 28 seconds left in overtime, lifting the Boston Bruins to a 3-2 win over the host Detroit Red Wings in Game 4 of their opening-round best-of-seven series.
